text: Fred Anton Maier (15 December 1938 - 9 June 2015) was a Norwegian speed skater. He won four Winter Olympics medals in 1964 and 1968. He was also a cyclist. He was born in Nøtterøy, Vestfold. Maier died from cancer on 9 June 2015 in Nøtterøy, aged 76. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Norwegian cyclists Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Norway Category:Olympic gold medalists for Norway Category:Olympic silver medalists for Norway Category:Norwegian speed skaters
title: Fred Anton Maier
